info.name: UPS Rating
info.description:
Compare delivery services and shipping rates to determine the best option.

Visit the full [UPS Rating Documentation](https://developer.ups.com/api/reference?loc=en_US#tag/Rating_other) for more details!

header.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32
An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

query.description: Valid Values: timeintransit = The server rates with transit time information combined with requestoption in URL. Rate is the only valid request option for Ground Freight Pricing requests.

variable.description: Supported values: v2403

Valid Values: Rate = The server rates (The default Request option is Rate if a Request Option is not provided). Shop = The server validates the shipment, and returns rates for all UPS products from the ShipFrom to the ShipTo addresses. Rate is the only valid request option for Ground Freight Pricing requests.

request.description: This HTTP POST request takes in origin information (**ShipFrom**), destination information (**ShipTo**), and **Package** information and returns the estimated cost of that movement.

response.name: Simple Rate Success
